mapper.sql: a.id, a.name, a.type, a.icon, a.url, a.parent_id as "parentId", a.parent_ids as "parentIds", a.permission, a.sort, a.available, a.remarks, a.create_date as "createDate", a.update_date as "updateDate", a.status as "status", b.name as "resource.name", b.parent_id as "resource.parentId", b.parent_ids as "resource.parentIds"
LEFT JOIN sys_resource b ON b.id = a.parent_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_resource a
a.status='0'
and a.type = #{type}
order by a.sort asc
mapper.delete: update sys_resource set status='1' where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM sys_resource a WHERE a.parent_id=#{id}
